alert.note: Alert for Rock (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 24 at 12:36PM CST until January 25 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of east central and southeast South Dakota, northwest and west central Iowa and southwest Minnesota. This includes the tribal lands of the Flandreau Santee Sioux Tribal Nation. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to noon CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind chills Tuesday night into Wednesday morning may again drop as cold as 25 degrees below zero.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
